name: event-card
title: Event Card
oneLiner: A compound event card component with header, content and actions

apiDoc.name: EventCardRoot
apiDoc.description: Root component for compound event card builder pattern. Creates context for nested EventCard.Header, EventCard.Content, EventCard.Actions, and EventCard.Dropdown subcomponents. Supports optional click handler for interactive cards. Renders as button when clickable, div otherwise. Uses Svelte 5 snippet pattern for children composition.
